languages.text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: [draft] At the beginning of combat, inflict {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Prey{/g} status to the enemy with highest difficulty type without spending a charge of Hunt Down The Prey and has doubled {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for its kill

At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

languages.text: 战斗开始时，自动将最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最高的敌人标记为{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}。此效果不消耗击杀猎物能力的使用次数，当击杀该猎物时，给予双倍击杀猎物{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: 战斗开始时，自动将最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最高的敌人标记为{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}。此效果不消耗击杀猎物能力的使用次数，当击杀该猎物时，给予双倍击杀猎物{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果。
战斗开始时，自动将最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}最高的敌人标记为{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}。此效果不消耗击杀猎物能力的使用次数，当击杀该猎物时，给予双倍击杀猎物{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加成{/g}效果。

languages.text: 戦闘開始時、獲物狩りのチャージを消費せずに、最も{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が多い敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}効果を与え、そのキルに対して獲物狩りの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を2倍与える。
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘開始時、獲物狩りのチャージを消費せずに、最も{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が多い敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}効果を与え、そのキルに対して獲物狩りの{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を2倍与える。

languages.text: Al principio del combate, inflige el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} al enemigo con más {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} sin gastar una carga de Cazar a la presa y duplica la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Cazar a la presa al matarlo.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: Al principio del combate, inflige el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} al enemigo con más {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} sin gastar una carga de Cazar a la presa y duplica la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de Cazar a la presa al matarlo.

languages.text: Belegt den Gegner mit den meisten {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn des Kampfes mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}, ohne eine Ladung Jagd auf die Beute machen zu verbrauche, und gewährt für seine Ausschaltung den doppelten Jagd auf die Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: Belegt den Gegner mit den meisten {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn des Kampfes mit dem Effekt {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}, ohne eine Ladung Jagd auf die Beute machen zu verbrauche, und gewährt für seine Ausschaltung den doppelten Jagd auf die Beute-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}.

languages.text: В начале боя накладывает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} на противника с самым высоким {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровьем{/g}, не расходуя заряд Законной добычи. При убийстве этой цели дает удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Законной добычи.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} status on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: В начале боя накладывает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} на противника с самым высоким {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g}, не расходуя заряд Законной добычи. При убийстве этой цели дает удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Законной добычи.

В начале боя накладывает эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добыча{/g} на противника с самым высоким {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g}, не расходуя заряд Законной добычи. При убийстве этой цели дает удвоенный {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} Законной добычи.

languages.text: Au début du combat, inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} à l'ennemi dont le {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}niveau de difficulté{/g} est le plus élevé sans utiliser de charge de Traque de la proie, et confère un double {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} Traque de la proie pour son élimination.
languages.original_text: At the start of combat, inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} effect on the enemy with the highest number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} without spending a charge of Hunt Down the Prey and grants a double Hunt Down the Prey {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} for killing it.

traits.locale_text: Au début du combat, inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Proie{/g} à l'ennemi dont le {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}niveau de difficulté{/g} est le plus élevé sans utiliser de charge de Traque de la proie, et confère un double {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} Traque de la proie pour son élimination.

languages.text: Çatışma başladığında en yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanına sahip düşmanı hiç Av Peşinde kullanım hakkı harcamadan {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}av{/g} hâline getirir ve bu düşman öldürüldüğünde de iki katı Av Peşinde {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kazandırır.

traits.locale_text: Çatışma başladığında en yüksek {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanına sahip düşmanı hiç Av Peşinde kullanım hakkı harcamadan {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}av{/g} hâline getirir ve bu düşman öldürüldüğünde de iki katı Av Peşinde {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} kazandırır.
